entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
